name: Last Light(house)
description:
You are the captain of a small ship that has been caught in a storm while crossing the open ocean. The winds and waves have been so fierce that you have been blown off course and have lost all sense of direction.

As the storm subsides, you find yourself adrift in the middle of the ocean with no land in sight. The only thing that gives you hope is the faint glow of a lighthouse in the distance. You realize that this beacon could be your only chance of finding your way back to civilization.

Can you reach the lighthouse and find your way home? Or will you be lost at sea forever? The fate of your ship is in your hands.

Game developed with UE5 and built for Windows.

The game has 2 endings!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls (Gamepad supported):

Movement: WASD

Interact: E - RMB

Close: F

Zoom: LMB

Jump: Spacebar

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
